General.Name: AbleGroup Bhd
General.Description: AbleGroup Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the processing, trading, export, and contract workmanship of marble and granite slabs in Malaysia. It operates through, Building Material and Property Development segments. The company supplies, delivers, and installs stone and tiling works. It is also involved in the property development business. The company was formerly known as Gefung Holdings Berhad and changed its name to AbleGroup Berhad in June 2012. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. AbleGroup Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Parallel Pinnacle Sdn Bhd.
